thread.section_title: SkyLux Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SkyLux Travel | www.skyluxtravel.com | 2 of 105
thread.title: Mr. IAIN MACPHERSON
thread.title_full: SkyLux Travel reviewed by Mr. IAIN MACPHERSON

author: Mr. IAIN MACPHERSON
title: Mr. IAIN MACPHERSON
text:
This was my first experience using Skylux Travel. I have always booked directly with the airline. Therefore, I was slightly apprehensive as to what to expect from this site.. However, the service offered was excellent. An incredibly quick and efficient process that provided suitable business class seats at a great price. I would like to compliment Ginger, my contact lady. She did a great job in a very timely manner! Will I use this service again? Certainly! Would I recommend this site to my friends? Certainly!
Now all I have to do is get on that jet plane!
